name: BlazBlue: Continuum Shift II
description:
In BlazBlue: Continuum Shift II welcomes old faces and new alike! Choose from all your favorite characters from the previous game as well as various new characters such as Makoto, Valkenhayn, Platinum, and Mu-12! Experience two new stories and the brand new Abyss Mode for even more BlazBlue gameplay fun! Battle your friends via Ad Hoc to see who's the best! Do you have it in you to rise to the top and become the best BlazBlue player around!?
